summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works and City Engineer to construct a 30 inch water main with necessary appurtenances in East 42nd Street, from 5th Avenue Northeast to 1st Avenue Northeast; 1st Avenue Northeast, from East 42nd Street to North 41st Street; North 41st Street, from 1st Avenue Northeast to Whitman Avenue; Whitman Avenue, from North 41st Street to North 39th Street; North 39th Street, from Whitman Avenue to Palatine Avenue, and appropriating money therefor.
